title: Panel Of Nakshe (women's Trouser), 18th–19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: Polychrome silks, predominantly red and green, solidly worked in cross stitch on cotton canvas in diagonal rows of lozenges separated by narrower diagonal bands; all forms built up of minute floral motifs. Vertical border at one end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel Of Nakshe (women's Trouser), 18th–19th century.
18th–19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-9.
